name: Tale Of A Wolf - Preview
description:
Tale Of A Wolf is a story driven open world adventure game where you harness the essence of the fallen to increase your own strength.

You will need to look after your hunger and thirst, whilst taking down human camps across the island.  

Each base will be a mission and once you destroy all inhabitants you will be rewarded with enough essence to level up and move onto the next area.

You will need to return to a safe zone to level up stats in order to progress.

There will be additional skills to unlock as you progress such as alternative bite attacks and takedown kills.

Caves, once cleared of all creatures will become a safe zone the player can then use to level up.

Survive the wildlands, gather your allies and collect essence to level up. Get ready to drive the men polluting the land out of your territory!

*** This is a short playable experience, there are bugs and issues.  Please bear this in mind***
